title: Pizza Fino
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pizzeria and bar. Several vegan choices including a house-made veggie meatball parmesan sub; pizza toppings like marinated tempeh; a vegan pizza with spinach, caramelized onions & roasted pepper-cashew sauce. Garlic knots contain cheese, so vegans need to specify no cheese, and kitchen will make some for you.
